data.name: Hazard Ops: Ice Viper Pack
data.detailed_description:
If it comes to the crunch, it is often that one devastating shot which decides the outcome of a battle. This pack makes sure that you live to see this outcome. Merciless, fast and absolutely destructive. An ice-cold viper assault.

Cool ice design and a hail of bullets. The Assault Viper gives you just the right feeling on the battlefield. With 8 slots of space for modifications, it can be upgraded to become an absolute killing machine. The Carbon Barrel mod (+4 Damage -1 Range) will add that extra punch, and a whole bunch of M67 grenades provide annihilating power (additional damage against Domain troops in all Assault modes as well as Turret Defense).

But that’s not all! Get this pack, and you’ll receive a free 30-day VIP Access on top (+30% XP and Coins, Access to the VIP Store and loads of status bonuses). Invest in this pack, and you will receive 3,000 Cash on top! It’s worth it!


Weapons

  • Assault Viper (Permanent)
  • M67 Assault Grenade (7 Days)

Consumables & Mods

  • AR Carbon Barrel (7 Days)
  • Grenade Pack (7 Days)
  • 1x VIP Access (30 Days)
  • 1x Supply Box
  • 1x Key Card
  • 3x Grenade Turret
  • 3,000 Cash

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7 or 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.0GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 7600GT (must support Shader Model 3.0)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7 or 8
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, Core 2 Quad, i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT240 or newer (equals Radeon 3650 series)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
